mapper.select: select t1.user_id, t1.nick_name, t2.dept_name from sys_user t1 left join sys_dept t2 on t1.dept_id = t2.dept_id where t1.del_flag= 0

select t1.id, t1.user_id, t1.project_id, t2.nick_name, t3.dept_name from pms_project_resources t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id left join sys_dept t3 on t2.dept_id = t3.dept_id where t1.project_id = #{projectId} and t1.is_manager = '1'
select t1.user_id, t1.nick_name, t2.dept_name from sys_user t1 left join sys_dept t2 on t1.dept_id = t2.dept_id where t1.user_id = #{userId}
